name: Don't let it die
description:
this project was made in 3 months as part of my final exam, this game is a recreation of an existing board game I like to play called Don't let it die, the game is done and by that I mean this is what I have delivered to my teachers, there are a few changes and a balancing act left to do, but overall I am happy with how this turned out.

[How to play]

use the mouse and click to move 

use  [esc] or the cross in the top of corners to close menus
